mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rn FROM ( SELECT d.delivery_code, d.order_date, d.dedt, COUNT(i.product_code) AS delivery_qy FROM delivery d JOIN delivery_details i ON d.delivery_code = i.delivery_code WHERE d.company_se = 'CP02' AND i.delivery_qy > 0 GROUP BY d.delivery_code, d.order_date, d.dedt ORDER BY d.delivery_code )a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}) page WHERE page.rn >= #{start}

SELECT p.product_code, p.product_name, d.request_qy, SUM(DISTINCT d.delivery_qy) AS productQy, sub.totalQy, SUM(DISTINCT e.error_qy) AS errorTotalQy FROM delivery_details d JOIN product_info p ON d.product_code = p.product_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT delivery_code, product_code, SUM(store_qy) AS totalQy FROM inventory GROUP BY delivery_code, product_code ) sub ON d.delivery_code = sub.delivery_code AND d.product_code = sub.product_code LEFT JOIN inventory_error e ON sub.delivery_code = e.lot WHERE d.product_se = 'PT02' AND d.delivery_code = #{deliveryCode} GROUP BY p.product_code, p.product_name, request_qy, sub.totalQy

SELECT p.product_code, p.product_name, o.product_color, SUM(d.delivery_qy) as productQy, SUM(DISTINCT i.store_qy) as totalQy FROM delivery_details d join product_info p on d.product_code = p.product_code left join inventory i on d.delivery_code = i.delivery_code left join product_option o on p.product_code = o.product_code WHERE d.product_se = 'PT01' AND d.delivery_code = 'DEV2502220005' group by p.product_code, p.product_name, o.product_color
SELECT get_comm(product_size) as product_size_info FROM product_option WHERE product_code = #{productCode} GROUP BY product_size ORDER BY product_size
